camera_and_perspective.view_angle: High-angle drone shot, Wide aerial cityscape, 45Â° Bird's eye view
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: Wide-angle lens (approx 24-35mm), Rectilinear correction, Strong atmospheric perspective depth
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Sharp foreground architecture, Soft atmospheric fade in background

lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Soft cool ambient skylight, Glowing artificial city lights, Low contrast environmental fill
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Hazy urban atmosphere, Thin fog in distance, Overcast twilight sky
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Soft ambient occlusion, No directional cast shadows, Diffuse night shading

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Warm tungsten office window spill, Randomized interior occupancy patterns, Soft commercial glow
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Warm linear LED contour lighting (3000K), Roofline strip lights, Podium edge highlighting, Building massing outlines

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Amber streetlamp arrays on grid roads, Continuous highway light trails, Car headlights, Parking lot floodlights
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Dim ambient park glow, Low contrast dark foliage areas
landscape_lighting.water_feature_effects: River reflection of skyline lights, Diffuse blue sky reflection on water surface

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Blue and Gold complementary, Cool urban tints, Cyberpunk-lite, Deep blues and warm oranges
color_and_grading.post_processing: Lifted blacks (matte shadow look), Reduced contrast in distance (haze), HDR dynamic range, Noise reduction

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: V-Ray night render, Corona Renderer atmospheric setup, Unreal Engine 5 city sample style
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic night aerial photography, Urban planning visualization
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, High density urban fabric, Complex city infrastructure
